text: water aka crystal dragon update: klastorna is running dangerously low so if you want some of the last of that, now is time. Next up is gerolsteiner. It should be all ready to go, carbonated and cold and everything. After that is an experimental half batch of Lavaredo which should be very "interesting". After that is full 5 gallon batch Lurisia -- special request from Amanda. Should be quite subtle. These last two are Italian.
